I've been on the road for almost a month with my kids. We drove from Arizona to L.A., up the west coast, then I90 with brief detours (e.g. yellowstone, beartooth pass, rushmore, badlands) from Seattle to Boston. We touched Maine, took the ferry to Long Island, did July 4th in D.C. yesterday, and are now in Virginia. Today we stopped at the McCormick Gap overlook in Shenandoah national Park to see the Blue Ridge mountains and Shenandoah valley. Tomorrow we drive through West Virginia itself...had to stop by and listen to this song as we're finally and gradually heading home.
July 2025, anyone?
